name: The Hotelspace
overview:
The Hotel Space is a New Zealand based company that provides a variety of hotel and motel products to the hospitality industry. Their comprehensive product range includes furniture, lighting, linen, bedding, soft furnishings, artwork, motel accessories, mirrors, glass & tableware, conference equipment, outdoor furniture, restaurant equipment, signage, sanitary ware, rugs and more. They are committed to meet clients’ needs and offer customized products to fit individual needs.

The Hotel Space is committed to delivering durable, contemporary products that are fit for purpose. The Hotel Space team is easily contactable and can offer design advice upon request and quotes for quantity discounts. The Hotel Space caters to New Zealand and the Pacific and offers freight arrange delivery of commercial grade products at competitive prices. If buyers are looking for inspiration The Hotel Space offers a detailed catalogue to help spur a creative design solution to fit a variety of needs. This company makes deciding a stylish theme simple.

It offers a range of styles such as urban, eco, establishment and element themes, which provide clients with a creative package to create a modern and stylish looking room. The Hotel Space has a full online catalogue making browsing easy and encourages all interested browsers to contact them with any question or comment.
